name: R5-OperationOutcome-R4-OperationOutcome
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 OperationOutcome into FHIR R4

element.display: Information about the success/failure of an action

target.display: Information about the success/failure of an action
target.comment: R5 `OperationOutcome` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome`
R5 `OperationOutcome.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.contained`

R5 `OperationOutcome.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `OperationOutcome.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `OperationOutcome.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `OperationOutcome.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.implicitRules`

element.display: A single issue associated with the action

target.display: A single issue associated with the action
target.comment: R5 `OperationOutcome.issue` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue`

R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.code` - code has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/issue-type|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/issue-type|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.details` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.details`

element.display: Additional diagnostic information about the issue

target.display: Additional diagnostic information about the issue
target.comment: R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.diagnostics` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.diagnostics`

element.display: FHIRPath of element(s) related to issue

target.display: FHIRPath of element(s) related to issue
target.comment: R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.expression` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.expression`

R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.id`

element.display: Deprecated: Path of element(s) related to issue

target.display: Deprecated: Path of element(s) related to issue
target.comment: R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.location` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.location`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `OperationOutcome.issue.severity` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.severity` - severity has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/issue-severity|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/issue-severity|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `OperationOutcome.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `OperationOutcome.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `OperationOutcome.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.meta`

R5 `OperationOutcome.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `OperationOutcome.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `OperationOutcome.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `OperationOutcome.text`
